channel.title: Making a command that resets the position of your NPCS in your server
channel.description: Is it possible to make a command that resets the position of all npcs? Like lets say somebody is maging my npcs and they aren't in the place they're supposed to be. All I do is type in ::resetnpc and it resets and refreshes them all. Is that possible to make?

item.title: Making a command that resets the position of your NPCS in your server
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Alright…That would then lead me to my next question…How would I make it? And I know restarting server is one way…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 09:11:23 pm[/size][hr]Umm…Still need help

Read full topic
item.source: Making a command that resets the position of your NPCS in your server
